item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: UPS (United Parcel Service, Inc.) Large UPS stock looks attractive after a selloff as the package-delivery leader works to cut costs and boost profits. ADM (Archer-Daniels-Midland Company) Middle Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. presents both opportunity and risk, with its diverse revenue streams and accelerated share repurchase program offset by lower sales, earnings decline, and ongoing investigation.
